    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int color
      0 for white and 1 for black
      private Coord coord
      Coordinate on the board
      private boolean moved
      Simple flag to determine if the piece moved at least once
      private java.util.ArrayList<Coord> moves
      Contains all possible moves on the board
      private java.util.ArrayList<Coord> theoretical_moves
      Contains theoretical moves on the board
      private char type
      k - king
      q - queen
      r - rook
      b - bishop
      h - horse
      p - pawn
      e - empty
